Name: Penguin Hunting
About the game: Getting food in the north is very difficult and dangerous. Especially the penguins, for which you have to play. Bypassing traps and wild animals, collect all the fish. Penguin Hunting - 2d platformer, in the role of a penguin you need to collect all the fish on the level and take them to the house. Beware of eagles and bears, each of them is a mortal danger for you. Develop a strategy and complete all levels. Game Features: - Difficulty levels - Obstacles and traps - Dynamic Music - Pixel Art
